level.heading: Issuance of building permit or certificate of occupancy.
level.text: Prior to the issuance of a building permit or certificate of occupancy for the commercial development, whichever is applicable, the applicant shall certify to the District that the provisions of this part have been satisfied.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 5-76, see notes following ยง 1-306.31.
For Law 12-275, see notes following ยง 1-306.31.
